patthana22.18:4.1: Navipākaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.18:4.2: Navipākaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.18:4.3: Navipākaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana22.18:5.1: Navipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.18:5.2: Navipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.18:6.1: Nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.18:6.2: Nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.18:7.1: Navipākaṃ nahetuñca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana22.18:8.1: Navipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana22.18:9.1: Navipākaṃ nahetuñca navipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.18:9.2: Navipākaṃ nahetuñca navipākadhammadhammaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.18:9.5: Hetuyā ekādasa, ārammaṇe ekādasa, adhipatiyā nava … pe … purejāte nava, āsevane cha … pe … vipāke pañca … pe … avigate ekādasa.
patthana22.18:10.1: Navipākaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.18:10.3: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … aññamaññe cuddasa … pe … vipāke nava … pe … avigate aṭṭhārasa.
